backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend canister with data types and CRUD operations for episodes, characters, news, gallery images, clans, and user profiles, with role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single implemented feature: adding an Internet Identity login/logout button inline next to the Gallery section heading in Gallery.tsx, with glassmorphism styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, and configuration file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app with the page title set to 'Whispers Of The White Moon' and a root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, admin, and donate pages, wraps everything in React Query, and renders FloatingDonateButton globally via RootLayout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Story section component with scroll-triggered slide-in paragraphs, a glowing section heading, and three story-pillar cards describing the world, conflict, and prophecy.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Renders a styled 'Access Denied' page with a shield icon and a link back to the home page, shown when a user lacks admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard layout with a sidebar navigation for Episodes, Characters, News, Gallery, and Clans panels, plus a principal ID display and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Admin panel for managing characters, providing a modal form to add/edit character fields (name, clan, role, bio, initials) and delete functionality via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Admin panel for editing existing clans, offering a modal form to update clan name, symbol, description, and primary color using the updateClan query hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Admin panel for managing episodes with a modal form to create or edit episode details (title, summary, number, duration, status, thumbnail, video link) backed by add/update/delete query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Admin panel for managing gallery images, supporting drag-and-drop or file-input image upload and a modal form to set title, alt text, and category via add/update/delete query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin panel component for managing news entries, providing UI for creating, editing, and deleting news items with category badges and a modal form.
frontend/src/components/Characters.tsx: Character grid section that fetches characters from the backend and renders clan-colored avatar cards with staggered fade-in animations and dynamic glow effects on hover.
frontend/src/components/Clans.tsx: Renders a responsive grid section displaying the seven elemental clans with animated fade-in cards, each showing a clan emblem, name, element, tagline, and description with dynamic glow effects.
frontend/src/components/Episodes.tsx: Fetches and displays a sorted list of anime episodes with staggered fade-in animations, showing episode number, title, summary, duration, and a status badge (Released, Coming Soon, In Production).
frontend/src/components/FloatingDonateBu: A floating donate button that navigates to the /donate route, hidden on the /donate and /admin pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, smooth-scroll navigation links, social media icons, and conditionally shows an admin panel link for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Displays a filterable image gallery merging static and backend images, with lightbox support, staggered fade-in animations, and an admin-only upload button with Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadMod: A modal form for admins to upload gallery images via file drag-and-drop or URL input, with category selection and submission to the backend via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with layered visual effects (gradient, parallax banner image, noise, scanlines, particles) and animated title reveal for the 'Whispers of the White Moon' anime series.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, active section tracking via IntersectionObserver, a sliding underline indicator, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/News.tsx: News section that fetches and displays sorted news entries with category badges, dates, and staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Thin fixed progress bar that reflects the user's scroll position as a percentage of the total page height.
frontend/src/components/WorldMap.tsx: Interactive world map section rendering clickable hotspot markers over a map image; clicking a marker opens a lore modal for the selected location.
frontend/src/components/WorldMapLoreModa: Portal-based modal that displays lore details (name, clan affiliation, description) for a selected world map location, with keyboard and backdrop dismiss support.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines the Character interface and exports a static array of six named characters, each linked to a clan with role, title, bio, and initials.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines the Clan interface and exports a static array of seven elemental clans with display metadata including colors, icon paths, symbols, and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Defines the Episode interface and exports a static array of eight Season 1 episodes with titles, summaries, release statuses, and durations.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery types and exports a static list of gallery images and available category filters for the gallery feature.
frontend/src/data/news.ts: Defines the NewsEntry interface and exports a static array of five news entries with categories, dates, and body text.
frontend/src/data/worldMap.ts: Defines the WorldMapLocation interface and exports a static array of named map locations with clan affiliations, lore descriptions, landmarks, glow colors, and positions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: A React hook that applies a CSS translateY parallax scroll effect to a referenced div element, disabled on touch devices and when reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/hooks/useParticles.ts: A React hook that renders an animated canvas particle system with floating colored dots and connecting lines between nearby particles.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, episodes, gallery images, characters, news, and clans using a shared actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollFadeIn.ts: A React hook that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger a fade-in visibility state when the referenced element scrolls into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaggeredFadeIn.ts: A React hook that staggered-fades in multiple elements using IntersectionObserver, with configurable delay between each item and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the design system, Tailwind imports, custom scrollbar styles, and animations for gallery, donate, and auth UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page component that conditionally renders a login screen, loading spinner, access denied view, or the admin dashboard based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Renders the admin login page for the site, featuring an Internet Identity authentication button, animated background particles, and a glassmorphism card styled to match the dark cinematic theme.
frontend/src/pages/Donation.tsx: Displays a donation/support page with five tiered supporter levels (Moon Clan to Legendary Balance), each showing perks and styling, rendered over a background image with a glassmorphism card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the project's custom dark/cinematic color palette (void, moon-blue, gold, ember, etc.), custom fonts (Cinzel, Rajdhani), glow box-shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 43) for the 'Whispers Of The White Moon' anime site, documenting architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for build planning continuity.
